DataElement.preferredName: Complete Bioassay Details If Unrelated Laboratory Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The yes/no response to a question that refers to the possibility that a standard operating procedure (SOP) is present.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Complete Bioassay Details If Unrelated Laboratory
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: To possess every necessary or normal part or component or step; having come or been brought to a conclusion._A method of measuring the effects of a biologically active substance using an intermediate in vivo or in vitro tissue or cell model under controlled conditions. (from MSH98)_Particulars considered individually and in relation to a whole._A modifier term indicating a condition to follow._Unrelated; not connected or associated e.g. by kinship._Laboratory; a workplace for the conduct of scientific research.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: To possess every necessary or normal part or component or step; having come or been brought to a conclusion.:A method of measuring the effects of a biologically active substance using an intermediate in vivo or in vitro tissue or cell model under controlled conditions. (from MSH98)

Concepts.definition: To possess every necessary or normal part or component or step; having come or been brought to a conclusion.
A laboratory test or analysis of the biological activity of a substance performed by studying its effect on an organism or in a test tube under controlled conditions.

Property.preferredDefinition: Particulars considered individually and in relation to a whole.:A modifier term indicating a condition to follow.:Unrelated; not connected or associated e.g. by kinship.:Laboratory; a workplace for the conduct of scientific research.

Concepts.definition: Particulars considered individually and in relation to a whole.
A modifier term indicating a condition to follow.
Not connected or associated e.g. by kinship.
A facility equipped and competent to conduct scientific experiments, observations, tests, investigations, and/or to manufacture chemicals or medical products.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Tests, examinations, evaluations used to determine a subject's status or response to intervention.
ConceptualDomain.changeDescription: Created initially to support CCR value domain for CTMS.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Indicator of Yes or No to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
